title: Changing Login screen
body: I would like to change back my login screen to the star guardian login screen. Anyone can help me? the recent patch just put it back to Ivern login screen :'(.{{champion:99}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:40}}

replies.body:
1. Go to: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.220[or whathever you currently have]\deploy\mod\lgn\themes
2. Delete loginIvern and the rest and leave only SG. Dont delete the "parchment" folder. 
3. Re-launch LoL

Leave the window open in case you want to do control z to undo what you did, or save all those folders in your PC as a backup. If it doesn't work the login screen will show black. In that case you can just put everything as it was. 

I switched to the beta and now I'm crying because I cant put the SG login screen anymore. 

Cheers!

-Wim.

Unfortunately, there's no login screen changer so it wouldn't be possible to return to that.  You can be like me, though, and listen to it on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6kEZEvMYKQY) for an hour.  :D  Hope that helps!
what if, there is a third party program, that allows you to switch loading screen, would you get in trouble.
